articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.title: Google Sparks Backlash After Gmail Setting Lets Gemini Peek Inside Inboxes - Decrypt
articles.description: Google has faced criticism after a buried setting allowed Gemini to scan inboxes and calendars without clear notice to users.
articles.content:
In brief
  • A buried Gmail setting let Gemini analyze emails and calendars unless users opted out.
  • Confusion spread on X and Reddit as people questioned when the feature was enabled.
